item.text: Thats what we are using a Smallest Federated Wiki for.
Sructure of a pitch, a fundin application or a competition entry have similar structure.

Sructure of a pitch, a fundin application or a competition entry have similar structure. Things we do often have converging ideas behind them. For example, our target groups can overlap, our aims, objectives and indicators of success can be very similar

Sructure of a pitch, a fundin application or a competition entry have similar structure. Things we do often have converging ideas behind them. For example, our target groups can overlap, our aims, objectives and indicators of success can be very similar. No one said that an application for funding or a pitch should be a unique work of art, quite the opposite. Small comunity projects benefit from learning each other structure and the ways it is formulated.

Sructure of a pitch, a fundin application or a competition entry have similar structure. Things we do often have converging ideas behind them. For example, our target groups can overlap, our aims, objectives and indicators of success can be very similar.

No one said that an application for funding or a pitch should be a unique work of art, quite the opposite. We benefit from borrowing best practices from each other as well as the ways to communicate what we are about.
We can just get basic boring structure out of the way and focus on things which we actually want to innovate.

story.text: Thats what we are using a Smallest Federated Wiki for.

Sructure of a pitch, a funding application or a competition entry have similar structure. Things we do often have converging ideas behind them. For example, our target groups can overlap, our aims, objectives and indicators of success can be very similar.

No one said that an application for funding or a pitch should be a unique work of art, quite the opposite. We benefit from borrowing best practices from each other as well as the ways to communicate what we are about.
We can just get basic boring structure out of the way and focus on things which we actually want to innovate.
